author: mohamad momeni

comments.message: I like the idea of cooling the face.  It is the one area that might not be completely cloth covered if a full face shield and external respirator is used.  As such it might be easier to cool than the rest of the body which because of the layers of clothing is proving difficult.
I'd love to have something like this when travelling on an airplane.

description:
Imagine filtered air covers your face like a shower from your top of head to your chin. So, you can go every where without any risk of virus infection. For more protection you can use gloves.
The filtered air can be produced with an air pump plus special filters and its power comes from batteries. All of these equipments will be in your pocket.
Air is filtered with above equipments then covers your face through special hat that is on your head.
summary: This is a self air shower that helps healthcare workers get this chance to work better and have less risk of thermal shocks by wearing traditional PPEs in hot and humid air.Filtered air covers all face and prevents from breathing virus contained air.
title: self air shower
